name: Pour Decisions
description:
Working frantically to get this working!

------------------------------

Oh no!

Your notes are missing just as you are about to officiate a wedding. Maybe had a bit too many celebratory drinks?

Do your best with what you can find in your pockets and hope for the best! 

Just focus on wedding things and happy stuff or something!

Good Luck! You'll need it...

--------------------------------

First game jam submission and second game overall. Really happy with how this one developed.
